fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
Pecking Order- (Night) Target a player. While you are alive, all attacks against Cogs by this player will be 2 tiers weaker.
Nap Time!- (Night) [Cheat] Target a Cog. They will be roleblocked tonight, but they will gain a Powerful autovest. While they have this autovest, they are Overcharged.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Insomnia (Passive) You will reflexively deal a Powerful Attack to anyone who uses a sound-based (host discretion) ability against you.
-Pecking Order affects attacks of any kind, not just direct attacks.
